metadata.title: CVE-2022-40958

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5
SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP6

metadata.description: By injecting a cookie with certain special characters, an attacker on a shared subdomain which is not a secure context could set and thus overwrite cookies from a secure context, leading to session fixation and other attacks. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 102.3, Thunderbird < 102.3, and Firefox < 105.
